page.title: 07Bawdeswell Garden Centre
page.content: "Bennetts Garden Centre" stands on 1.5 acres of land. The proprietor, Mr Underwood, took over 2.5 years ago and runs this retail garden centre with the help of family, 3 full-time and 2 part-time staff. His range of 10,000 items includes fruit trees and bushes, ornamental trees and shrubs both ever- green and deciduous in hundreds of varieties. Also on sale are bedding plants, perennials, bulbs, pot plants, and artificial flowers, some of which are made of silk. Other goods range from books on gardening through the necessary tools and equipment up to greenhouses and garden sheds. Bennetts trade reflects the surge of interest in gardening and leisure in recent decades as more people become property owners, as instanced by the range of conservatories, garden furniture, patio materials and barbeque equipment
